response.overview: The "Secrets of the Basking Shark" refers to a documentary film and also a topic of ongoing scientific research exploring the mysterious behaviours of the basking shark, the second-largest fish in the world. This gentle giant, known for its passive filter-feeding, has several intriguing secrets, including impressive breaching capabilities, unique courtship rituals, and deep-water migrations.
response.title: Secrets of the Basking Shark
